tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is good. I feel good.Dr help me. I am feeling very good. Thank you. Dr understand me and my illness.Thank you.

tags: None
review: I would recommend her to everyone. She has been my doctor for 25  years now. Whenever I have been ill, I have always relied on doctor Usha Gupta for my treatment. Telling you about my most recent treatment and series of consultations I took when I got infected by Covid-19 on 17Apr (rtpcr report date) and then it's recurrence (on 4th May). My reports were not good but thanks to doctor Usha Gupta I was not required to be taken to the hospital when there were no hospital beds available in Delhi NCR. She suggested the right tests at the right time which helped her prescribe me the right medicines at the right time. She treated me like I was her own kid. Thank you doctor Usha Gupta
reply_text: Thank you Akash. Hope you stay healthy and safe forever

tags: None
review: Dr. Usha is well qualified and competent Obstetrician/Gynecologist with more than 30 years of experience in the same. She has this innate ability to listen and understand your problem. She is happy to provide detailed advice and treatment. Me and my mom regularly consult Dr. Usha and we are satisfied. She not only tells us what to do (when we are ill) but also tells us why to take a particular medicine or why to take certain tests. I would like to recommend her specifically to all the women patients!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Urinary Tract Infection (Uti),Urinary Tract Infection,Diabetes complications,
review: I was having headache and high fever with chills, headache, nausea, frequent urination. I consulted dr. Usha and she tested my sugar and got me tested for UTI. My sugar came high and UTI was detected. She gave me treatment for diabetes and for urine infection. My fever got treated in 2 days but she asked me to continue medicine for another 10 days. nor my sugar is controlled and urine infection is treated.
reply_text: Keep a watch on your sugar levels and don't skip your antidiabetic medicine

tags: None
review: ******* ******** *** *** ***** *** **** ** ******* * ********  I will not refer to go any patient. Not available at appointment time
reply_text: I was busy with another Gynae patient in the Nursing Home for emergency.Patient should have some patience . It may happen with everybody.Doctor always know which patient should be attended first.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited the doctor last month. I was having palpitations and head ache. Doctor diagnosed hypertension. She gave me few medicines for hypertension and got some blood tests done. my cholestrol came high. she gave me medicines to lower my cholestrol as well and suggested me some lifestyle changes and to reduce some weight. Now I am fit and fine. Thanks for my treatment doctor.

tags: None
review: I visited Dr. Usha Gupta when me and father had Covid in April 2021.  My father had some complications and I was feeling very very weak. We consulted Dr. Usha Gupta and it was a great experience. We got well in 10 days and our condition did not get more worse. After that I also consulted her for my mother for a Gynae problem (would not like to disclose the problem) using video calling through whatsapp. My mother is happy with her consultation and she would want to consult her again in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted dr. Usha when my grandmother was having fever and on doctors recommendation we tested for malaria and it came out positive. My grandmother's entire treatment for malaria was managed by dr. Usha. .My grandmother has completely recovered now. thanks doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Usha few days back for my health issue. She was very friendly and explained me the complete prescription she wrote basis my condition diagnosed. She was easily reachable when I could not find the prescribed medicine to buy it's replacements of same salt composition from the chemist
reply_text: Thanks Navtej. Hope you are feeling well now

reply_text: Thanks Anirban. Hope you stay in good health

review: I visited Dr. Usha for my low blood pressure issue. She did listen to me in detail and then asked few follow up questions to understand my issue and my history in detail. I am happy with her consultation. I regularly visit & sometimes consult her online for all my health issues now. I am happy with her advice and consultation. Thank you Dr. Usha!

tags: None
review: My overall experience was excellent. The staff was accommodating and Dr. Usha is professional, efficient, empathetic, and also delightfully quick witted. She gives time to all her patients so seeing her is worth the wait. Appointment was almost on time. I came away with that warm feeling of confidence....and I got well in few days

tags: None
review: I came to know about Dr Usha from my friend. I visited her for Gynaecology problem and treatment was started on July 20. Now the problem is much better. Most doctors had said that this problem could not be cured and I have to live with it. Thanks to Dr Usha I could be fine again. God bless Dr Usha

tags: None
review: Dr. Usha is a very nice and generous person. She listens to the patients problems very calmly and resolves it in a smooth manner. I have been consulting her from past 5 years for my mother's diabetes and Gynae related issues and we are very satisfied with her. Recently, my whole family was covid positive and my father's Sp02 came down to 85-88. It was her guidance that he recovered without any hospital admission. I would recommend her on any day. *** ** *** ** *** **** ********** ** *****

tags: None
review: Dr. Usha saved life of my wife & our new born. During our pregnancy, my wife, had some complications & got COVID. Dr Usha was very prompt, caring, gave right medical advice & did the required tests. Right decisions at crucial times by Dr.Usha saved our lives. Thanks Dr Usha 😊

tags: None
review: This is the other clinic where she used to provide consultations before. She rarely visits this clinic now. I think it is need basis as she is a visiting doctor in this Clinic. I consulted her when I had stomach pain and recurring loose motions. She prescribed few medicines which worked very well for me. She also suggests what all should be eaten during this issue and how I need to stay hydrated and restore body salts and minerals. I recommended her few of my friends as well and everyone had praised her.

review: I visited Dr Usha last month. I was having loose motions, weakness and mild fever. This was because I was suffering from diarrhea. Doctor listened to my problem patiently. She asked me to take few medicines and shared the prescription for the same. I got well in 3 days. Thanks doctor
